# lcod://tooling/hash/to_key@0.1.0

Build a key from text content with optional prefix using SHA-256.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `text` | string | No | Input text to hash. |
| `prefix` | string | No | Optional prefix prepended to the hash. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `key` | string | Generated key. |
